name: Inner silence (itch)
description:
Inner silence is a 2D puzzle platformer designed in a retro style.

We play as an ordinary boy who is lost, and we have to help him get home.
You will travel through a mysterious world, overcoming various dangers.
The whole game is based on special mechanics where you have to change the gravity by using special buttons.
Features:
Many interesting and challenging levels
Different types of traps
A lot of mysteries and secrets.
